page.title: 07 TRADE 2
page.content: There are two garages in Rowhedge {Riverside Motors}and{Rowhedge Garage, which has an M.O.T. facility and serves petrol. There are two clusters of small businesses, each employing less than l0 people. The first cluster consists of:-{Perrots,}the German-based agricultural irrigation firm which maintains a sales/workshop; {Freezer Fridge Service; Washing {Machine Sales Ltd;}and{Colchester & {Clacton Fencing Co. }The second cluster consists of five firms, the largest of which is{M.A. Perry & Co., who supply diesel spares to truck, tractors and ships;{Christian Design & {Print}produce posters and printing of a religious nature;{C.R.B. Precision {Engineering}work in sheet metal and produce machine tools;{Essex Window {**************************************
